body_html:
@andydavis1 I believe @BingzheWu is asking the same question I have over in StackOverflow. There is no resolution to this issue on StackOverflow so I have posted the following:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/42517926/how-to-freeze-lock-weights-of-one-tensorflow-variable-e-g-one-cnn-kernel-of-o

Please consider reopening or responding in StackOverflow. Several people have this same question.
